.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkPipelineMultisampleStateCreateInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_PIPELINE_MULTISAMPLE_STATE_CREATE_INFO
* [[VUID-VkPipelineMultisampleStateCreateInfo-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL`
* [[VUID-VkPipelineMultisampleStateCreateInfo-flags-zerobitmask]] pname:flags must: be `0`
* [[VUID-VkPipelineMultisampleStateCreateInfo-rasterizationSamples-parameter]] pname:rasterizationSamples must: be a valid elink:VkSampleCountFlagBits value
* [[VUID-VkPipelineMultisampleStateCreateInfo-pSampleMask-parameter]] If pname:pSampleMask is not `NULL`, pname:pSampleMask must: be a valid pointer to an array of latexmath:[\lceil{\mathit{rasterizationSamples} \over 32}\rceil] basetype:VkSampleMask values
****
